short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut buttons for chat messages on OGS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OGS Quick Chat adds a row of buttons to the OGS chat box during games (not the chat room of the site) which allow players to send one-click messages such as "Have fun", "Thanks for the game", etc. The messages can be customised via the OGS Quick Chat icon which appears to the right of the address bar.
